title: American Horror Stories (FX on Hulu) Trailer HD
author: TV Promos
comment: At this point, if you move into the murder house, you deserve whatever you get
I'm pretty stoked about this. Looks like they're going back to the AHS roots. 🤞
Just a reminder, Evan Peters was seen on a set in his original Tate costume... so he's either appearing in AHS10 or this show as Tate!
don't start freaking out about the cast guys this is only for the first five episodes and this looks really good! im so excited for billies episode!! also cody fern is going to be in episodes six!
This looks great so far. Kaia gerber looks surprisingly believable delivering the lines we saw in the trailer.
description:
American Horror Stories is a weekly anthology series that will feature a different horror story each episode. American Horror Stories is a new anthology series from Emmy and Golden Globe award winning producer Ryan Murphy spun off from FX's biggest, longest running original drama hit, “American Horror Story”. Subscribe to tvpromosdb on Youtube for more American Horror Stories season 1 promos in HD!


» Watch American Horror Stories Thursdays on FX on Hulu
